definitions.definition: A temple dedicated to all the gods .
All the gods of a particular people or religion, particularly the ancient Greek gods residing on Olympus , considered as a group.
A category or classification denoting the most honored persons of a group.

main_definition: ( religion ) A temple dedicated to all the gods .
secondary_definitions: ( mythology ) All the gods of a particular people or religion, particularly the ancient Greek gods residing on Olympus , considered as a group.
( by extension ) A category or classification denoting the most honored persons of a group.
